document.full_text: a damning short-seller's report accusing sino-forest corp  of theft and fraud put the skids under the canadian-listed company on friday, even as it denied there was a problem.
document.title: sino-forest clobbered by short-seller's report
lines_and_colors: a damning short-seller's report accusing sino-forest corp  of theft and fraud put the skids under the canadian-listed company on friday, even as it denied there was a problem.
